00001 #ifndef CONST_P_ARRAY_ITERATOR_H
00002 #define CONST_P_ARRAY_ITERATOR_H
00003 
00004 /*

00011 namespace Util
00012 {
00013 
00033    template <typename Data>
00034    class ConstPArrayIterator
00035    {
00036 
00037    public:
00038 
00044       ConstPArrayIterator()
00045        : current_(0),
00046          end_(0),
00047          data_(0)
00048       {}
00049 
00055       void setCurrent(Data** ptr)
00056       { 
00057          current_ =  ptr;
00058          data_    = *ptr; 
00059       }
00060 
00066       void setEnd(Data** ptr)
00067       {  end_ = ptr; }
00068 
00072       void setNull()
00073       {
00074          current_ = 0; 
00075          end_ = 0; 
00076          data_ = 0; 
00077       }
00078 
00084       bool isEnd() const
00085       { return (current_ == end_); }
00086 
00092       bool notEnd() const
00093       { return (current_ != end_); }
00094 
00100       const Data* get() const
00101       { return data_; }
00102 
00104 
00105       
00111       const Data& operator* () const
00112       { return *data_; }
00113 
00119       const Data* operator -> () const
00120       {  return data_; }
00121 
00127       ConstPArrayIterator<Data>& operator++ ()
00128       {
00129          ++current_;
00130          if (current_ != end_) {
00131            data_ = *current_;
00132          } else {
00133            data_ = 0;
00134          }
00135          return *this;
00136       }
00137 
00139       
00140    private:
00141 
00142       // Pointer to the current Data* pointer.
00143       Data** current_;
00144 
00145       // Pointer to one element one past last Data* pointer in the array.
00146       Data** end_;
00147 
00148       // Pointer to current Data object.
00149       Data*  data_;
00150 
00151    };
00152 
00153 } 
00154 #endif
